room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Cove" by Mind Thrill Escape Rooms in Mackinaw City
room_address: 136 S Huron Ave Mackinaw City, MI 49701
room_description: It's the early 1700s and you are in the midst of the pirate era. You and a group of others have stolen from the legendary pirate, Black Beard. Fearing his wrath and what's to come, you escape on an expedition towards sanctuary. After a long journey, you come across pirate's cove. As you enter, boulders block the entrance behind you...
